Cyber Claw:




Cyber Claw took flight, flying only a few feet off the ground, escaping the 
shots from Koga and Serpentor. One nearly hit her leg. She hovered in the 
air, watching the two carefully.

"My memory is a dangerous thing," she said to them. "Kinda scarry if you 
think about it. If I went into my memory files, I'd go insane. Again." She 
laughed. "Now, stop playing games. Where is Megatron?"
